articles.content: United States President Joe Biden seemed irked' on Saturday after being interrupted by a reporter during an interaction on his countrys domestic debt ceiling negotiations. Shush up, ok? Biden told th… [+2234 chars]

articles.title: Quad leaders express deep concerns over consequences of Ukraine war - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Quad Leaders Summit was hurriedly convened in Hiroshima after the original plan to hold it in Sydney on May 24 fell through because Biden called off a planned visit to Australia due to a debt ceiling crisis in the US | Latest News India
